content.rendered:
Anil is a Mechanical Engineer & MBA with Professional Post Graduate Diploma in Marketing from CIM. He has been teaching in Further/Higher Education for over 11 years. He has varied corporate experience (14 years) including working as a Project Engineer, B2B and B2C Marketing which he thoroughly enjoyed and learnt from. This experience provided him all the necessary concepts to be incorporated in teaching the business-related subjects. He has also completed PGCE and QTLS enabling him to learn different tools of ensuring the seamless transfer of knowledge/application. He has also worked as Distance Learning Coordinator for over 5 years wherein he has been successful in his efforts to bridge the gap between face to face and Distance Learning. Anil has been associated with Regent since May 2019 and always enjoyed working in this conducive, positive and challenging culture.

Courses taught

HND in Business
